markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Spit](/Feats.aspx?ID=941) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 12 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Tian-Dan ethnicity

</column>

---

Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true—you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. Choose one of the following cantrips: [_acid splash_](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), or [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245). You can cast this spell as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell’s energy emerges from your mouth.

<title level="2">Dragon Spit leads to...</title>
[Dragon Prince](/Feats.aspx?ID=953)
name: Dragon Spit
